spec_data.Name: texlive-pkfix
spec_data.Description:
The perl script pkfix looks for DVIPSBitmapFont comments in
PostScript files, generated by 'not too old' dvips, and
replaces them by type 1 versions of the fonts, if possible.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:46:38 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Replace pk fonts in PostScript with Type 1 fonts
